description: Provides information about the storage location that should be used when uploading a file and information about the destination project and limits that may apply

uploadDestination.description: Details of the storage location where the file should be upload.

destinationProjectId.description: The ID of the project where this file will be uploaded.

projectStorageLocationUsage.description: This object includes information about size and limits associated with this project storage location.  Clients should not attempt to upload a file to this location if isOverLimit=true or if (<size_new_file> + sumFileBytes) is greater than maxAllowedFileBytes.
